gamepad_is_supported.htm+html.head.title: gamepad_is_supported.htm+html.body.p:90-3
gamepad_is_supported: With this function you can find out whether the target platform supports game pads (returns <tt>true</tt>) or not (returns <tt>false</tt>).

gamepad_is_supported.htm+html.head.title: gamepad_is_supported.htm+html.body.p:100-3
gamepad_is_supported: The above code checks to see if a gamepad is supported and stores the return value in a global variable for future checks.
